name: multiselectjs
description: A library for implementing multiselection in GUIs.

scripts.build-min: node_modules/.bin/browserify js/multiselect.js -s multiselect -t babelify | uglifyjs > dist/multiselect.min.js
scripts.build-min-extras: node_modules/.bin/browserify js/multiselect_with_extras.js -s multiselect -t babelify | uglifyjs > dist/multiselect_with_extras.min.js
scripts.build: npm run build-no-debug && npm run build-no-debug-extras
scripts.build-d: npm run build-debug && npm run build-debug-extras

author: Jaakko JÃ¤rvi
